modName: Change the Walk Type of Zombies
modShortDescription: Leaderdog changed all the walktypes of 7 Days to Die zombies to the nurse's walk, other than the spider zombies, crawlers and fatties.
modDescription:
As many of you, Leaderdog find melee combat frustrating especially with the twitchy zombies, it feels like a RNG swing where you either get lucky or you don’t.

Seeing as a zombie is a basically a slow floating soccer ball on a tee ball stand it shouldn’t be that complicated to hit.

Leaderdog changed all the walktypes of 7 Days to Die zombies to the nurse’s walk, other than the spider zombies, crawlers and fatties.

For him this feels much more enjoyable. He never liked the twitchy zombies since he doesn’t think that’s a behaviour classical [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) would have. Arguably he could have just removed the twitchy walk, but he changed most to the nurse instead.

If you find the [melee](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-melee-weapons/) combat frustrating, give it a try and see what you think.

[Download](https://github.com/leaderdog/7daystodie-Walktype-Modlet/raw/master/Walktype-Vanilla.rar) for Vanilla  
[Download](https://github.com/leaderdog/7daystodie-Walktype-Modlet/raw/master/Walktype%20-%20Darkness%20Falls.rar) for [Darkness Falls Mod](https://7daystodiemods.com/darkness-falls-mod/)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16739-alpha-18-modlet-to-change-walktype-to-lessen-the-frustration-of-melee-combat/).

**Credits:** leaderdog  
_Special Thanks:_ SMiThaYe
